name: air-balloon
effect: Held : Holder is immune to ground-type moves, spikes, toxic spikes, and arena trap. This effect does not apply during gravity or ingrain. When the holder takes damage from a move, this item is consumed.
short_effect: Held: Grants immunity to Ground-type moves, Spikes, and Toxic Spikes. Consumed when the holder takes damage from a move.

flavor_text.sun-moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder will float in the air until hit. Once hit, this item will burst.
